Verses: 1 alangam Kattimudindhu, Kadhavugal Podappattu, Vaasal Kaavalaalaraiyum Paadagaraiyum, Leviyaraiyum Erpaduththinapinbu,

2 naan En Sagodharanaagiya Aanaaniyaiyum, Anegaraippaarkkilum Unmaiyullavanum Dhevanukku Bayandhavanumaayirundha Aramanaiththalaivanaagiya Ananiyaavaiyum, Erusalemin Kaavalvisaaranaikku Erpaduththinen.

3 avargalai Nokki: Veyil Erumattum Erusalemin Vaasalgal Thirakkappadavendaam, Neengal Nirkumpodhe Kadhavugalai Saaththith Thaazhppaal Pottu, Erusalemin Kudigalil Kaavalaalar Avaravar Thangal Kaavalile, Avaravar Thangal Veedugalukku Edhiraaga Niruththappadavendum Endren.
4 pattanam Visthaaramum Peridhumaayirundhadhu, Adharkulle Janangal Konjamaayirundhaargal, Veedugalum Kattappadavillai.

5 appozhudhu Vamsa Attavanaigalaip Paarkkiradharku, Naan Prabukkalaiyum Adhigaarigalaiyum Janangalaiyum Koodivarachcheyya, En Dhevan En Manadhile Oru Ennaththai Undaakkinaar; Mundhi Vandhavargalin Vamsa Attavanaip Pusthagam Appozhudhu Enakku Agappattadhu; Adhile Ezhudhiyirukka Naan Kandadhu Ennavendraal,

6 baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Siraipidiththupponavargalum, Siraiyiruppilirundhu Serubaabelodum, Yesuvaa, Negemiyaa, Asariyaa, Raamiyaa, Nagamaani, Mordhegaai, Pilsaan, Misperedh, Pikvaayi, Nekoom, Paanaa Enbavargalodunkooda Vandhu,
7 erusalemukkum Yoodhaavukkum Thirumbith Thangal Thangal Pattanangalile Kudiyiranginavargalumaana Indha Dhesaththin Puththiraraagiya Isravel Janangalaana Manidharin Thogaiyaavadhu:
8 paaroshin Puththirar Irandaayiraththu Nootru Ezhubaththiranduper.
9 sepaththiyaavin Puththirar Munnootru Ezhubaththiranduper.
10 aaraagin Puththirar Arunootru Aimbaththiranduper.
11 yesuvaa Yovaab Enbavargalin Sandhadhikkullirundha Paagaadhmovaabin Puththirar Irandaayiraththu Ennootrup Padhinettupper.
12 elaamin Puththirar Aayiraththirunootru Aimbaththunaaluper.
13 saththoovin Puththirar Ennootru Naarpaththaindhuper.
14 sakkaayin Puththirar Ezhunootru Arubadhuper.
15 pinnoovin Puththirar Arunootru Naarpaththettupper.
16 pebaayin Puththirar Arunootru Irubaththettupper.
17 askaadhin Puththirar Irandaayiraththu Munnootru Irubaththiranduper.
18 adhonigaamin Puththirar Arunootru Arubaththezhuper.
19 pikvaayin Puththirar Irandaayiraththu Arubaththezhuper.
20 aadheenin Puththirar Arunootru Aimbaththaindhuper.
21 esekkiyaavin Sandhadhiyaana Aadherin Puththirar Thonnootru Ettupper.
22 aasoomin Puththirar Munnootru Irubaththettupper.
23 pesaayin Puththirar Munnootru Irubaththunaaluper.
24 aareeppin Puththirar Nootruppanniranduper.
25 kibiyonin Puththirar Thonnootru Aindhuper.
26 bethlagem Ooraarum, Neththobaa Ooraarum Nootru Enpaththettupper.
27 aanadhoththoor Manidhar Nootru Irubaththettupper.
28 pedhasmaavedh Ooraar Naarpaththiranduper.
29 keeriyaadhyaareem, Kepiraa, Perodh Oorgalin Manidhar Ezhunootru Naarpaththumoondruper.
30 raamaa, Kaabaa Oorgalin Manidhar Arunootru Irubaththoruper.
31 mikmaas Ooraar Nootru Irubaththiranduper.
32 beththel, Aayi Oorgalin Manidhar Nootru Irubaththumoondruper.
33 veroru Nepo Ooraar Aimbaththiranduper.
34 matroru Elaam Puththirar Aayiraththu Irunootru Aimbaththunaaluper.
35 aareem Puththirar Munnootru Irubadhuper.
36 eriko Puththirar Munnootru Naarpaththaindhuper.
37 lodh, Aadheedh, Ono Oorgalin Puththirar Ezhunootru Irubaththoruper.
38 senaagaa Puththirar Moovaayiraththuth Tholaayiraththu Muppadhuper.
39 aasaariyaraanavargal: Yesuvaa Kudumbaththaanaagiya Yedhaayaavin Puththirar Tholaayiraththu Ezhubaththumoondruper.
40 immerin Puththirar Aayiraththu Aimbaththiranduper.
41 paskoorin Puththirar Aayiraththu Irunootru Naarpaththezhuper.
42 aareemin Puththirar Aayiraththup Padhinezhuper.
43 leviyaraanavargal: Odhiyaavin Puththirarukkulle Kadhmiyelin Kumaaranaagiya Yesuvaavin Puththirar Ezhubaththunaaluper.
44 paadagaraanavargal: Aasaabin Puththirar Nootru Naarpaththettupper.
45 vaasal Kaavalaalaraanavargal; Salloomin Puththirar Adherin Puththirar, Thalmonin Puththirar, Akkoopin Puththirar, Adhidhaavin Puththirar, Sobaayin Puththirar, Aaga Nootru Muppaththettupper.
46 nidhaneemiyaraanavargal: Seegaavinpuththirar, Asubaavin Puththirar, Thapaagoththin Puththirar,
47 kerosin Puththirar, Seeyaavin Puththirar, Paadhonin Puththirar,
48 lebaanaavin Puththirar, Akaabaavin Puththirar, Salmaayin Puththirar,
49 aanaanin Puththirar, Kiththelin Puththirar, Kaagaarin Puththirar,
50 raayaagin Puththirar, Redhseenin Puththirar, Negodhaavin Puththirar,
51 kaasaamin Puththirar, Oosaavin Puththirar, Paaseyaagin Puththirar,
52 pesaayin Puththirar, Meyuneemin Puththirar, Nebishaseemin Puththirar,
53 pakpookkin Puththirar, Agubaavin Puththirar, Arkoorin Puththirar,
54 pasleedhin Puththirar, Megidhaavin Puththirar, Arshaavin Puththirar,
55 parkosin Puththirar, Siseraavin Puththirar, Thaamaavin Puththirar,
56 nedhsiyaagin Puththirar, Adhibaavin Puththirar,
57 saalomonudaiya Velaikkaararin Puththiraraanavargal: Sodhaayin Puththirar, Sopereththin Puththirar, Peridhaavin Puththirar,
58 yaalaavin Puththirar, Tharkonin Puththirar, Kiththelin Puththirar,
59 sepaththiyaavin Puththirar, Aththeelin Puththirar, Pokeredh Sebaayimilulla Puththirar, Aamonin Puththirar.
60 nidhanimiyarum Saalomonudaiya Velaiyaatkalin Puththirarum Egaththukku Munnootruth Thonnootriranduper.

61 thelmelaagilum, Thelarsaavilum, Kerubilum, Aadhonilum, Immerilum Irundhuvandhum, Thaangal Isravelar Endru Thangal Pidhaakkalin Vamsaththaiyum, Thangal Poorvoththaraththaiyum Sollamaattaamal Irundhavargal:
62 thelaayaavin Puththirar, Thobiyaavin Puththirar, Negodhaavin Puththirar, Aaga Arunootru Naarpaththiranduper.
63 aasaariyargalil Abaayaavin Puththirar, Kosin Puththirar, Kileyaaththiyanaana Parsillaayin Kumaaraththigalil Oruththiyai Vivaagampanni, Avargal Vamsa Naamam Tharikkappatta Parsillaayin Puththirar.
64 ivargal Thangal Vamsa Attavanaiyaith Thedi, Adhaik Kaanaamarpoi Aasaariya Oozhiyaththukku Vilakkamaanavargal Endru Ennappattaargal.
65 ooreem Thummeem Enbavaigalulla Oru Aasaariyan Ezhumbumattum, Avargal Magaa Parisuththamaanadhile Pusikkaththagaadhendru Thirshaadhaa Avargalukku Sonnaan.
66 sabaiyaar Ellaarum Egaththukku Naarpaththeeraayiraththu Munnootru Arubadhuperaayirundhaargal.
67 avargalaiththavira Ezhaayiraththumunnootru Muppaththezhuperaana Avargaludaiya Velaikkaararum, Velaikkaarigalum Irunootru Naarpaththaindhu Paadagarum Paadagigalum Avargalukku Irundhaargal.
68 avargaludaiya Kudhiraigal Ezhunootru Muppaththaaru, Avargal Koveru Kazhudhaigal Irunootru Naarpaththaindhu.
69 ottagangal Naanootru Muppaththaindhu, Kazhudhaigal Aaraayiraththu Ezhunootru Irubadhu.

70 vamsaththalaivaril Silar Velaikkendru Koduththadhaavadhu: Thirshaadhaa Aayiram Thangakkaasaiyum, Aimbadhu Kalangalaiyum, Ainnootru Muppadhu Aasaariya Vasthirangalaiyum Pokkishaththukkuk Koduththaan.
71 vamsaththalaivaril Silar Velaiyin Pokkishaththukku Irubadhinaayiram Thangakkaasaiyum, Irandaayiraththu Irunooru Raaththal Velliyaiyum Koduththaargal.
72 matra Janangal Irubadhinaayiram Thangakkaasaiyum, Irandaayiram Raaththal Velliyaiyum, Arubaththezhu Aasaariya Vasthirangalaiyum Koduththaargal.

73 aasaariyarum, Leviyarum, Vaasal Kaavalaalarum, Paadagarum, Janangalil Silarum, Nidhaneemiyarum, Isravelar Anaivarum Thangal Thangal Pattanangalil Kudiyerinaargal; Ezhaam Maadhamaanapodhu, Isravel Puththirar Thangal Pattanangalil Irundhaargal.
